items.name: CDR
items.description: ADC common regular data register for dual and triple modes

fields.name: DDS
fields.description: DMA disable selection for multi-ADC mode

fields.name: DMA
fields.description: Direct memory access mode for multi ADC mode

fieldset/CDR.description: ADC common regular data register for dual and triple modes

fields.name: DATA
fields.description: 1st data item of a pair of regular conversions

fields.name: JEOC
fields.description: Injected channel end of conversion of ADC

variants.name: Div2
variants.description: PCLK2 divided by 2

variants.name: Div4
variants.description: PCLK2 divided by 4

variants.name: Div6
variants.description: PCLK2 divided by 6

variants.name: Div8
variants.description: PCLK2 divided by 8

variants.name: Single
variants.description: No new DMA request is issued after the last transfer

variants.name: Continuous
variants.description: DMA requests are issued as long as data are converted and DMA=01, 10 or 11

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: DMA mode disabled

variants.name: Mode1
variants.description: DMA mode 1 enabled (2 / 3 half-words one by one - 1 then 2 then 3)

variants.name: Mode2
variants.description: DMA mode 2 enabled (2 / 3 half-words by pairs - 2&1 then 1&3 then 3&2)

variants.name: Mode3
variants.description: DMA mode 3 enabled (2 / 3 half-words by pairs - 2&1 then 1&3 then 3&2)

variants.name: Independent
variants.description: All the ADCs independent: independent mode

variants.name: DualRJ
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, combined regular and injected simultaneous mode

variants.name: DualRA
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, combined regular and alternate trigger mode

variants.name: DualJ
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, injected simultaneous mode only

variants.name: DualR
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, regular simultaneous mode only

variants.name: DualI
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, interleaved mode only

variants.name: DualA
variants.description: Dual ADC1 and ADC2, alternate trigger mode only

variants.name: TripleRJ
variants.description: Triple ADC, regular and injected simultaneous mode

variants.name: TripleRA
variants.description: Triple ADC, regular and alternate trigger mode

variants.name: TripleJ
variants.description: Triple ADC, injected simultaneous mode only

variants.name: TripleR
variants.description: Triple ADC, regular simultaneous mode only

variants.name: TripleI
variants.description: Triple ADC, interleaved mode only

variants.name: TripleA
variants.description: Triple ADC, alternate trigger mode only
